DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective determine whether caffeine therapy associate decrease bone mineral content use dual energy x-ray absorptiometry . Secondary objective determine whether caffeine therapy associate increase incidence nephrocalcinosis bone fracture .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Caffeine Preterm Infants ' Bone Mineral Content
DOC.criteria: Preterm infant gestational age 34 week less consecutively admit neonatal intensive care unit Renal endocrinal disease Congenital anomaly Suspected chromosomal aberration Receiving diuretic steroid therapy
